long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple note-taking popup extension. Auto-deletes notes that you type in there as soon as the extension is clicked off of, however if you hit the save button it will not delete until the reset button is pressed.

Great for taking notes on the fly instead of jumping back and forth between what you're reading/listening to, and where you usually take notes.

Allows fast and efficient note-taking while:
-Reading from a textbook.
-Within a virtual meeting.
-On a call.
-Browsing sites.
